sources.title: Atlantic Adventure
sources.description: “Sailing the ocean silly” “Good cast” “Fresh and fast paced” (IMDB reviews quotes). A whimsical detective adventure with Lloyd Nolan, ex-silents comedian Harry Langdon and a large assortment bad guys and gals. Good production values for type. Sixty-eight minutes of entertaining nonsense. IMDB rating 5.6. Directed by Albert Rogell Released in 1935. Complete print. AKA “Sure Fire”

metadata.Plot: Fired for taking his fiancee to dinner, a reporter gets a hot tip on a cruise ship.
metadata.Writer: John T. Neville, Nat Dorfman, Diana Bourbon
metadata.Actors: Nancy Carroll, Lloyd Nolan, Harry Langdon
